summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the license or occupation tax upon certain business, occupations, pursuits and privileges under Ordinance 72630, amending Sections 3, 11, 12, 13 and 17 of said Ordinance to increase the minimum quarterly tax liability, the business license fee and the penalties for late payment of taxes; to revise delinquency dates; and to establish a new Small Business License and set the fees therefor.
